rules_text: Whenever you cast or copy an Adventure spell, if it’s your main phase, there’s an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.
rules_text2: Bring Ruin deals 4 damage to each creature and/or planeswalker that doesn’t have an Adventure. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]
